_sText:
DE_SNOWBOMB by unknown (released May 2011)

Unfortunately I didn't find in the Internet of any mention of the author of this small and simple but rather interesting map :-( Probably somebody will prompt..?

The scene of action of this map represents a some snow-covered station in the glacial gorge. There is also a system of underground tunnels of which terrorists should get out outside as if to rats from holes. But if they escaped, it is necessary to occupy perimeter defense! :-)

It seems that the map author used textures from classic Counter-Strike, but it at all doesn't disturb hazardous and fascinating gameplay!

About Playing with Bots: More or less playable NAV-file is included in archive.

Play and Test... also share with your impressions!
